title: Condolence reference held in memory of renowned journalist Javed Shahzad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP): The Press Information Department (PID) organized a condolence reference on Thursday in the memory of Javed Shahzad, the renowned journalist and Chief Reporter of Daily Ausaf and Surriya Jamal.
The event was coordinated under the supervision of Press Information Officer (PIO) Mubashir Hasan.
Hafiz Tahir Khalil from the Jang Group led the dua during the ceremony.
In his remarks, he paid glowing tribute to the late Javed Shahzad, emphasizing his invaluable contributions to journalism and urging all attendees to pray for his departed soul.
The ceremony was attended by Managing Director APP Asim Khan Khichi, Director News Shumaila Andleeb, officials from PID, Khurram Shahzad, brother of Javed Shahzad, and a large number of journalists.
The event served as a platform to remember and honor Javed Shahzadâ€™s legacy in the field of journalism, highlighting his dedication and professionalism.
